pages.text: Cells are items that can hold exotic materials like antimatter. $(bold)Becarful with them. They have a tendency to Explode and give deadly Gamma ray bursts!$()

Filling and emptying cells is done simply by putting the filled or empty cell in the input slot of the $(l:containment_chambers/neutral_containment)neutral containment's$() gui. $(bold)Cells must be charged to hold the material.$() They can be charged using most mods charging methods like Thermal Expansion's energetic Infuser or mekanism's energy cube.

$(bold)When the cells are filled with material they will drain power constantly. If they run out of power they will catastrophically fail!$() Make sure to use them up or empty them back into the neutral containment chamber before this happens. Cell Filling and emptying recipes are also shown in JEI.
